detaileddescription.para: the payload capacity of AVSmpte291mAnc8bit (and of AVSmpte291mAnc10bit when that gets added)

memberdef.name: AV_SMPTE_436M_CODED_ANC_SAMPLE_CAPACITY
memberdef.initializer: (AV_SMPTE_291M_ANC_PAYLOAD_CAPACITY + 4) /* 4 for did, sdid_or_dbn, data_count, and checksum */

detaileddescription.para: max number of samples that can be stored in the payload of AVSmpte436mCodedAnc
max number of bytes that can be stored in the payload of AVSmpte436mCodedAnc
AVSmpte291mAnc8bit::did when carrying CTA-708 data (for AV_CODEC_ID_EIA_608)
AVSmpte291mAnc8bit::sdid_or_dbn when carrying CTA-708 data (for AV_CODEC_ID_EIA_608)
not a real wrapping type, just here to guarantee the enum is big enough
Wrapping Type from Table 7 (page 13) of: https://pub.smpte.org/latest/st436/s436m-2006.pdf
only used for VBI
only used for VBI
only used for VBI
used for VBI and ANC
used for VBI and ANC
used for VBI and ANC
used for VBI and ANC
used for VBI and ANC
used for VBI and ANC
only used for ANC
only used for ANC
only used for ANC
not a real sample coding, just here to guarantee the enum is big enough
Payload Sample Coding from Table 4 (page 10) and Table 7 (page 13) of: https://pub.smpte.org/latest/st436/s436m-2006.pdf
Iterator over the ANC packets in a single AV_CODEC_ID_SMPTE_436M_ANC AVPacket's data
Wrapping Type from Table 7 (page 13) of: https://pub.smpte.org/latest/st436/s436m-2006.pdf
Payload Sample Coding from Table 4 (page 10) and Table 7 (page 13) of: https://pub.smpte.org/latest/st436/s436m-2006.pdf
An ANC packet with an 8-bit payload. This can be decoded from AVSmpte436mCodedAnc::payload.
Note: Some ANC packets need a 10-bit payload, if stored in this struct, the most-significant 2 bits of each sample are discarded.
An encoded ANC packet within a single AV_CODEC_ID_SMPTE_436M_ANC AVPacket's data. The repeated section of Table 7 (page 13) of: https://pub.smpte.org/latest/st436/s436m-2006.pdf

Validate a AVSmpte436mCodedAnc structure. Doesn't check if the payload is valid.
anc
ANC packet to validate
0 on success, AVERROR codes otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t *out, int size, int anc_packet_count, const AVSmpte436mCodedAnc *anc_packets)
memberdef.name: av_smpte_436m_anc_encode

detaileddescription.para:
Encode ANC packets into a single AV_CODEC_ID_SMPTE_436M_ANC AVPacket's data.
anc_packet_count
number of ANC packets to encode
anc_packets
the ANC packets to encode
size
the size of out. ignored if out is NULL.
out
Output bytes. Doesn't write anything if out is NULL.
the number of bytes written on success, AVERROR codes otherwise. If out is NULL, returns the number of bytes it would have written.

Append more ANC packets to a single AV_CODEC_ID_SMPTE_436M_ANC AVPacket's data.
anc_packet_count
number of ANC packets to encode
anc_packets
the ANC packets to encode
pkt
the AVPacket to append to. it must either be size 0 or contain valid SMPTE_436M_ANC data.
0 on success, AVERROR codes otherwise.

Set up iteration over the ANC packets in a single AV_CODEC_ID_SMPTE_436M_ANC AVPacket's data.
buf
Pointer to the data from a AV_CODEC_ID_SMPTE_436M_ANC AVPacket.
buf_size
Size of the data from a AV_CODEC_ID_SMPTE_436M_ANC AVPacket.
iter
Pointer to the iterator.
0 on success, AVERROR codes otherwise.

Get the next ANC packet from the iterator, advancing the iterator.
iter
Pointer to the iterator.
anc
The returned ANC packet.
0 on success, AVERROR_EOF when the iterator has reached the end, AVERROR codes otherwise.

Get the minimum number of bytes needed to store a AVSmpte436mCodedAnc payload.
sample_coding
the payload sample coding
sample_count
the number of samples stored in the payload
returns the minimum number of bytes needed, on error returns < 0. always <= SMPTE_436M_CODED_ANC_PAYLOAD_CAPACITY

memberdef.argsstring: (AVSmpte291mAnc8bit *out, AVSmpte436mPayloadSampleCoding sample_coding, uint16_t sample_count, const uint8_t *payload, void *log_ctx)
memberdef.name: av_smpte_291m_anc_8bit_decode

detaileddescription.para:
Decode a AVSmpte436mCodedAnc payload into AVSmpte291mAnc8bit
sample_coding
the payload sample coding
sample_count
the number of samples stored in the payload
payload
the bytes storing the payload, the needed size can be obtained from avpriv_smpte_436m_coded_anc_payload_size
log_ctx
context pointer for av_log
out
The decoded ANC packet.
returns 0 on success, otherwise < 0.

Fill in the correct checksum for a AVSmpte291mAnc8bit
anc
The ANC packet.

Compute the sample count needed to encode a AVSmpte291mAnc8bit into a AVSmpte436mCodedAnc payload
anc
The ANC packet.
sample_coding
The sample coding.
log_ctx
context pointer for av_log
returns the sample count on success, otherwise < 0.

memberdef.argsstring: (AVSmpte436mCodedAnc *out, uint16_t line_number, AVSmpte436mWrappingType wrapping_type, AVSmpte436mPayloadSampleCoding sample_coding, const AVSmpte291mAnc8bit *payload, void *log_ctx)
memberdef.name: av_smpte_291m_anc_8bit_encode

detaileddescription.para:
Encode a AVSmpte291mAnc8bit into a AVSmpte436mCodedAnc
line_number
the line number the ANC packet is on
wrapping_type
the wrapping type
sample_coding
the payload sample coding
payload
the ANC packet to encode.
log_ctx
context pointer for av_log
out
The encoded ANC packet.
returns 0 on success, otherwise < 0.

Try to decode an ANC packet into EIA-608/CTA-708 data (AV_CODEC_ID_EIA_608). This
anc
The ANC packet.
log_ctx
Context pointer for av_log
cc_data
the buffer to store the extracted EIA-608/CTA-708 data, you can pass NULL to not store the data. the required size is 3 * cc_count bytes. SMPTE_291M_ANC_PAYLOAD_CAPACITY is always enough size.
returns cc_count (>= 0) on success, AVERROR(EAGAIN) if it wasn't a CTA-708 ANC packet, < 0 on error.
